sections.headline: Exclusivity
paragraphs: With me, your property is not simply displayed in the shop window alongside many others. It is in the spotlight.
You receive personal, direct and committed support from the first conversation through to successful completion.
I deliberately take on only a limited number of mandates. This ensures your property gets the attention, care and exclusivity it deserves – and you get the support you can expect.
sections.extra: Few mandates. Highest level of care.

sections.headline: Flexible ways to get in touch.
paragraphs: You can rely on me to act flexibly and reliably whenever we arrange appointments. Punctuality and availability are a matter of course for me. I am also reachable outside standard business hours – whether by phone, WhatsApp or in a way that suits you best.
sections.extra: When you need me: just there.

sections.headline: Flexibility
paragraphs: Flexibility is not a buzzword for me – it has always been my working principle.

Every property, every owner and every situation is different — so I don’t use standard processes, but tailored solutions. Appointments, marketing channels, viewing models and coordination are consistently aligned to your needs and market conditions.
I respond quickly, think ahead and adapt strategies when framework conditions change.
The result: flexible processes — with a clear goal and reliable structure.

tippgeber.metaTitle: Give a tip – Referral programme | HE immologis
tippgeber.metaDescription: Become a referrer and earn up to €5,000 commission. Know someone who wants to sell? HE immologis UG.
tippgeber.heroSubline: Become a referrer and benefit from your recommendation.
tippgeber.introQuestion: Do you know someone who wants to sell their property?
tippgeber.introText: Then simply pass on the lead – and secure an attractive referrer bonus. You don’t need to organise anything or be an agent. A good contact is enough – we take care of the rest.
howSteps: You tell us about a property that is not yet publicly listed.
We contact the owner and take over the full marketing.
If a sale is completed through our brokerage, you receive your commission.
tippgeber.premiumTitle: Your bonus depending on sale price
tippgeber.hinweisText: When a tip is given for a property that is not publicly offered, we secure an exclusive brokerage mandate, market and sell the property – and upon completion the referrer bonus is paid out.
tippgeber.afterCheck: After review you will receive a written referrer agreement. Upon successful completion we pay your bonus directly to you.

provision.paragraph1: For the sake of clarity we would like to point out that, when instructed, a broker commission of 3.57% of the notarially certified purchase price applies, including statutory VAT. This commission is borne equally by buyer and seller unless otherwise agreed. The right to commission arises once the broker is instructed to carry out the brokerage and the purchase agreement has been notarially certified.
